title: Quality Improvement: What Is It and Who Is Responsible for It?
summary: Many opportunities exist for quality improvement activities in dialysis. As dialysis providers, it is important to know what quality measures are being evaluated. This article provides a summary of quality indicators nephrology nurses can measure and r â€¦
abstract: Many opportunities exist for quality improvement activities in dialysis. As dialysis providers, it is important to know what quality measures are being evaluated. This article provides a summary of quality indicators nephrology nurses can measure and review to ensure quality patient care.
